findings.title: The uniswapV3SwapCallback function lacks access control
findings.description: The visibility of _uniswapV3SwapCallback_ function is external, and there is no access control, Anyone can call this function to withdraw funds in the contract.

findings.title: The parameters of swapPlus function can be arbitrarily specified
findings.description: Users can arbitrarily specify all parameters during swap, which can lead to waiving fees, withdrawing funds from the contract, and conducting phishing attacks.

findings.title: Missing event trigger
findings.description: In the SwapFinder contract, there is no event trigger for following functions.

findings.title: Redundant code
findings.description: In the SwapFinder contract, there is some redundant code that is not used.
